dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 2637 IH: Fishing Safety Training and Research Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Keating introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend title 46, United States Code, to reauthorize the Fishing Safety Training Grant Program and the Fishing Safety Research Grant Program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Fishing Safety Training and Research Act.

section.header: Reauthorization of Fishing Safety Training Grant Program and Fishing Safety Research Grant Program

subsection.text: Section 4502(i)(4) of title 46, United States Code, is amended by striking 2015 through 2017 and inserting 2018 through 2028.
Section 4502(j)(4) of title 46, United States Code, is amended by striking 2015 through 2017 and inserting 2018 through 2028.
